attributes.action: Order Councils to reduce or not increase Council Tax in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Prime Minister to instruct All Councils in the UK to either reduce, or failing this, not increase Council Tax for the 2009/10 financial year.  This measure will directly affect the vast majority of people in this country and be a great help to all households during this economic downturn.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
